page_content:
23
Governing Our ESG Impact  
Within our strategic plan we empower our workforce to improve the world around us.  It is core 
to our company and fostered through the integrity of our workforce. The values we lay out for 
our company are reinforced within our systems, policies, and practices. This approach begins with 
our Board of Directors and executive management which participate in our ESG process and help 
direct the enterprise-wide direction of our ESG efforts. This process provides transparency and 
strategic direction of our ESG activities.
Providing governance and oversight over the strategy, risk, 
operations, and management of the firm.
